Start: ^I am woken up by an all too familar knock.
^I let out a small resigned sigh, as I get out of bed and answer the door.
^but when I open the door, Max is alone.
^Max stares at me like I'm a weirdo.

b: ^I look over to Timothy's bed, and see Timothy, getting out of it.
^Timothy is still here. his hair still dyed from the other day.
^Did I... Did I break the time loop?
^Timothy must have noticed I was staring at him.
^Max is sad. talks about how you either did or didn't help. regardless. theres no changing the past.

Ready: ^I think for a minute, looking around the room I've called my home for this past, I don't know how long.
^I follow Max down the hall with my stuff, stoping by the commons as we wait for my car.
^[Max] "Well, ya got a few minutes to wait. Any last goodbyes you wanna sneak in before your folks arrive?"
^I look around the commons, seeing the people I've come to know as friends, as doing their own thing in the room, as the day begins.
CharlotteEnd: ^I talk to Charlotte. One of three basic conversations occur.
^first, if you told Charlotte what your favorite kind of book you like, she will give one to you.

Polite: ^Charoltte is the same as ever, and you didn't really get close to her.
Leaving: ^Charoltte informs you that she is leaving too.

EduardoEnd: ^I walk over to Eduardo who is lying on the couch, looking down.

BrokeUp: ^Eduardo proceeds to bury his head into the couch.
^He starts cry talking thru the cushions, though I can't make out most of it.
^I can make out a very eloungated `whyyyyyyyyyy` before he un-buries his head.
^[Eduardo] " I thought our relationship was perfect?! How could this have happened. What went wrong?"
^Eduardo seems to immedeatly remember he is in a very public setting, as he poorly attempts to restrain himself.
^. I know this ain't your deal. You're getting out of this dang place today."
^[Eduardo] "Yeah, then, just, go. Don't let me drag you down."
^I leave Eduardo to sulk on the couch.
Patches: ^[Eduardo] "eh, well, I'm kinda coming down from the mania I've been riding most of the week, and... you know..."
^"Isaac and I had a rather long, and mostly miserable talk about our relationship."
^"There was s'me crying, you know. But I did what you said, and I listened, and let Isaac speak, and..."
^"and I think We'll be able to make this work."

b: ^Just then we both notice Isaac coming over towards us.
^[Eduardo] "But me and Isaac have taken up enough of your time with our relationship drauma. Go on. Get going."
^"Ya gotta a whole world out there to explore, or whatever."

TrissaEnd: ^I chat with Trissa. small variations, based on Charlotte's state.
^She's basiaclly always the same. her life is going fine, and you have little control over it to screw it up.

b: ^she does have more to say about Charlotte if you told Trissa she was jealous of her.
^in she will also have some varience to if charlotte is leaving.

TrissaEnd: ^regardless, you too say your goodbyes, and walk away.
IsaacEnd: ^I walk over to Isaac, who is leaning up at the wall, pretending to not be staring at Eduardo.

StoneWall: ^...<delay=2>Well this is going about as well as expected.
^I sort of just walk away after that, given Isaac is not in the mood to talk I suppose.
Outcome: ^] "Oh! I'm sorry to hear that man."
^] "Well it still sucks man. If you ever want to talk about it, or just get something off your chest. Just hit me up."
^] "Well, I'd better get going, my car is going to be here any minutes, and I still have some goodbyes to give."
Thanks: ^"Eduardo listened. We worked some stuff out."
^[Isaac] "He mentioned how you had talked to him before had about this stuff. knock some sense into him."
^] "No problem man. I was happy to help."

b: ^Just then we both notice Eduardo coming over towards us.
^] "Well, I'd better get going, my car is going to be here any minutes, and I still have some goodbyes to give."

Psychic: ^Isaac looks at me like I'm some sort of alien.
^[Isaac] "How did you know. So much. About me?"

b: ^Eduardo must have brought me up when they talked about their relationship.

Psychic: ^I guess I can't convince Isaac about the paranormal.
^] "Well, would you believe I'm a time traveller?"
^Well that one was at least true. I don't know what to say here.

b: ^Just then we both notice Eduardo coming over towards us.
^I suppose Isaac is not in the mood to be friendly with someone who know way more about him than he is comfortable with.

InE: ^The two kept just giving eachother brief glances before their eyes lock, and they both basheful look away.
^] "Are you two going to be okay?"

Guru: ^"We had a massive feelings jam all up in here, and-"
^[Eduardo] "a whole lot of TMI for you."

b: ^[Eduardo] "You really should get the deets on Isaac's storytelling chops."
^"That stuff is 200% pure sweetness. I love it."
^, why did you have to tell him about my stories?"
^] "Sorry Isaac. It just sort of came up."
^[Eduardo] "I would have never known that my Isaac had a saucier side. Mrow!"
^[Isaac] "<size=50%>I swear am never telling either of you embarressing secrets again.</size>"
^] "Eduardo, you do know they are just stories right. Fantasies. Its not like Isaac wants-"
^[Eduardo] "I know. I know. Jeez. what are you, our relationship counciler?"

Guru: ^. For helping. You didn't need to do that."
MindReader: ^[Eduardo] "It was rather suprising. That advice you gave me."
^"You said you had talked with Isaac, but Isaac said you hadn't."
^, I'm hard headed when I get stuck in a mindset, but ya ain't gotta lie to convince me."
^It wasn't really a lie, I just didn't get Isaac to talk to me this week, but whatever. I'll play this one slyly.
^"s'weird is all. You knowing us better than we do sometimes."

b: ^"Isaac found it really creepy when you knew about his stories too."
^Isaac blushes furiously, only capable of mumbling a little.
^] "Eh, what can I say, I'm a mind reader."
^I shrug, hoping that'll be enough to drop it, or change the subject at least.

MindReader: ^[Eduardo] "Well, thanks to you we were able to work things out communicating again. So, thanks for that."
OtherOne: ^The two walk their seperate ways. I guess they're trying to give eachother some space.
^Eduardo plops himself back on the couch, and Isaac goes to lean on the wall.

b: ^I decide I should go talk with Eduardo a bit, and say my goodbyes to him.
^I decide I should go talk with Isaac a bit, and say my goodbyes to him.

OutsideWorld: ^[Max] "Well I'm glad you're ready, but ya still gotta wait for your car."
^"So, got any plans for what your heading off to after this?"

c: ^] "I was thinking of school. another sort of stepping point into the real world."
^] "probably going to get a job. then when I can afford it, move out of my parents house."

g-0: ^, it was a pleasure meeting you."
^Max extends their hand. I grab their hand and give them a confident handshake.
^And, right on que, I see the car roll up to the halfway house.
^I go out, and give my parents a basic greatings.
^They help me with my bags, and we pack them in the car.
^When I get in the back seat, I look back out at the Sunflower House.
